blackengine.rendering

Class RenderEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.rendering.RenderEngine

  • public class RenderEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Engine singleton for rendering management.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCamera(CameraComponent cameraComponent) 
      void addFbo(java.lang.String name, FrameBufferObject fbo)
      Adds a new frame buffer object to the render engine, mapped to the specified name.

      Adds a light to the render engine.

      Creates a new singleton instance of RenderEngine.
      protected void destroy()
      Destroys this instance of RenderEngine and its master renderer.

      Getter for a specific frame buffer object.
      static RenderEngine getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of RenderEngine if it was created or throws a RenderEngineNotCreatedException if it has not yet been instantiated.
      java.util.stream.Stream<Light> getLightStream()
      Retrieves a stream of all lights that can be used for rendering.

      Getter for the pipeline manager containing the pipeline used for rendering and processing.

        public PipelineManager getPipelineManager()
        Getter for the pipeline manager containing the pipeline used for rendering and processing.
        Returns:

      • getFbo

        public FrameBufferObject getFbo(java.lang.String name)
        Getter for a specific frame buffer object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name the frame buffer object is mapped to.
        Returns:
        An instance of FrameBufferObject that is mapped to the specified name.

      • addFbo

        public void addFbo(java.lang.String name,
                   FrameBufferObject fbo)
        Adds a new frame buffer object to the render engine, mapped to the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - A String representing the name that the frame buffer object will be mapped to.
        fbo - An instance of FrameBufferObject.

      • isAnisotropicFilteringEnabled

        public boolean isAnisotropicFilteringEnabled()
        Getter for the flag whether anisotropic filtering is enabled.
        Returns:
        True if anisotropic filtering is enabled, false otherwise.

      • addLight

        public void addLight(Light light)
        Adds a light to the render engine.
        Parameters:
        light - An instance of Light that can be used for rendering.

      • removeLight

        public void removeLight(Light light)
        Removes a light from the render engine.
        Parameters:
        light - An instance of Light that will no longer be used for rendering.

      • removeAllLights

        public void removeAllLights()
        Removes all lights from the render engine.
